channel.title: .bat Error
channel.description:
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I've googled this and searched here can't seem to find out what to do. Any help?

item.title: .bat Error
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

Yeah. You’re using a ‘deprecated’ method, meaning that it’s been outsourced by a newer, better method. For example, show(boolean b) in Frame has been overwritten by setVisible(boolean b).

Read full topic

item.title: .bat Error
item.dc:creator: @imafatmess imafatmess
item.description:
@imafatmess wrote:

Whatever you compiled is ok. It will still work. It just says that code which is in the program is deprecated meaning old and, well, decrepid (want of a better word). Just don’t worry about it is all I have to say!

Read full topic
